titleStmt.title: The Christian pilgrime in his spirituall conflict and spirituall conqvest
Combattimento spirituale. English
titleStmt.author: Scupoli, Lorenzo, 1530-1610.
Castañiza, Juan de, d. 1598.
T. V. (Thomas Vincent), 1604-1681.
A. C. (Arthur Crowther), 1588-1666.

notesStmt.note: Written by Lorenzo Scupoli; sometimes attributed to Juan de Castañiza, who translated the work from Italian into Spanish. Cf. BM.
The spiritval conflict / translated by T.V.F. Sadler; The spiritvall conquest / translated by A.A. Crowther and Sadler.
"The spiritval conflict" (2nd ed.) (Wing C1219) and "The spiritvall conquest" (Wing C1220) with imprint: At Paris, MDCLI, have special title pages and separate pagination.
"The spiritual conquest" (Wing C1220) also appears, cataloged separately, at reel 623:21.
Each part of The spiritvall conquest also has special t.p.
Entries for C1218, C1219, and C1220 cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.). Items at 133:11 all part of S2166A
